comment.body: someone should use bitcannon.io to mirror tpb or a kickasstorrents mirror

run zeronet on it. run morph.is on it. run cjdns on it. then ssh to it and portforward those ports so you can access all of them from your home pc without having to keep them running on your home pc 24/7
thats awesome, what software are you using for the meshnet? is it cjdns?
My "Favorites" on my zeronet homepage always get restarted ;-;
@Tkarita: i'd like this. Maybe we should contact The Intercept people so they can run a mirror themselves.
@Wakelain: we should also get a SciHub mirror on Zeronet
@Nofish: i think ctrl+Enter is all around used to post except in programs where just Enter posts.
how does it know what users i would like by who i follow? is there some sort of tagging system?
@Nofish: ah, makes sense. Any plans on making everything work without any javascript?
could avatars appear on comments as well as OP post?
thats awesome! keep us updated with that app!
@megfault: sweet. you should look at morph.is itd be really nice to have something like aDTN working with it as i know the developer wants to work on meshnet features for it in the future.
it would be nice to run aDTN on pocketC.H.I.P.s https://getchip.com/pages/pocketchip
@Nofish: could we get a way to list ZeroMe posts by most recently posted in
